text: Kasone, ki [ma'ʙudi haqiqiro macmuai padar, pisar va Ruh-ul-qudus donistand va] guftand: "Alloh taolo savumin [nafar az] se [ma'ʙud] ast", hatman, kofir sudand. Ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] cuz ma'ʙudi jagona nest. Va agar az on ci megujand, ʙoznaistand, hatman, ʙa afrode az eson, ki kufr varzidand, azoʙi dardnoke xohad rasid
